item.title: About me
item.description: Maciej (Matthew) Morycinski retired from being an industrial automation technologist, to pursue other interests. Born in Poland, he now lives in Canada, in the province of British Columbia, city of Burnaby. His blog aims to entertain, educate, maybe provoke reflection. You can e-mail him at: m at tt dot moryce dot caThanks for reading! Please make sure to comment.

item.title: Beginnings
item.description: Grandpa’s typewriter was my first writing instrument. This had many advantages: no need to learn to hold a pen; no risk of smearing; it held paper for me. Legibility of text was perfect, if the reader overlooked a few words that were X-ed out. Of course, I had to learn to read first! – at least well enough to be able to recognize characters shown on keys. I quickly learned that there were many ways to write the same word, and made sure to ask Mom for correct spelling.
